title: Dragonslayer Vayne
body: Would Vayne ever get a VU on her Dragonslayer skin, to bring it up to par with the new ones out currently. That skin has been around for quite some time & I'd love to see it in a new light, as its one of my favorite skins for her.

replies.body:
She did receive a texture re-balance not too long ago.

(photo thanks to S@20)
I think they mean to make her red and more armored.
The texture re-balance is still bad. The blue armor is just completely off and she looks frumpy.. It doesn't look good on her at all in that current state.
If you don't like the skin don't buy it. Clearly the reasoning behind her being blue in the first place is that she's supposed to be a Night Hunter.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=PBkZcLQk,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-08T00:42:27.856+0000)
>
> She did receive a texture re-balance not too long ago.
> 
> (photo thanks to S@20)

Thanks for the reply Katey, I was just wondering if she'd get the new particle effects and be up to par. That's about all.
I totally agree, I think Dragonslayer {{champion:67}} and {{champion:59}} should be updated to be on-par with {{champion:80}} and {{champion:201}}. Even if that meant a price increase

I'm in the (seemingly small) boat of people who think her Dragonslayer skin looks dumb, mostly due to the needlessly exposed abdomen and chest.

Like seriously, this skin could look so cool, if only she was as consistently armored all over. 

And it's not like I'm being a prude about it, her being sexualized or whatever isn't why I dont like it, it's just the design itself doesn't make any sense. Why the huge open target right on her gut? That's kind of an important place to cover when fighting.

http://i.imgur.com/f1v6peA.png

She doesn't have to be fully armored, just designed so it looks like an epic skin on par with Dragonslayer {{champion:201}} and {{champion:80}} and not a 'sexy' skin. Hopefully her eventual VU can help fix that.
